title: Enable Yabai
description: Enable Yabai in the current space.
shellCommand: yabai -m space --layout bsp || yabai -m space balance

title: Disable Yabai
description: Disable Yabai in the current space.

title: Toggle Window Float Mode
description: Toggle float mode for the currently focused window.
shellCommand: yabai -m window --toggle float; yabai -m window --resize abs:500:800

title: Toggle Full-Screen Mode
description: Toggle full-screen mode for the currently focused window.

title: Toggle Native Full-Screen Mode
description: Toggle native full-screen mode for the currently focused window.

title: Focus Next Window
description: Focus the next window on the current desktop.

title: Focus Previous Window
description: Focus the previous window on the current desktop.

title: Swap Window Position
description: Swap the position of the currently focused window and the next window in the stack.

title: Rotate Windows Clockwise
description: Rotate the position of all windows on the current desktop clockwise.

title: Rotate Windows Anti-Clockwise
description: Rotate the position of all windows on the current desktop anti-clockwise.

title: Move Window Left
description: Move the currently focused window one space to the left.

title: Move Window Right
description: Move the currently focused window one space to the right.

title: Move Window Up
description: Move the currently focused window one space up.

title: Move Window Down
description: Move the currently focused window one space down.

title: Move Window to Next Display
description: Move the currently focused window to the next display.

title: Move Window to Previous Display
description: Move the currently focused window to the previous display.

title: Move Window to Next Space
description: Move the currently focused window to the next space.

title: Move Window to Previous Space
description: Move the currently focused window to the previous space.

title: Equalise Window Sizes
description: Equalise the size of all windows on the current desktop.

title: Mirror X-Axis
description: Mirror the layout of all windows on the current desktop along the x-axis.

title: Mirror Y-Axis
description: Mirror the layout of all windows on the current desktop along the y-axis.
